HotelElement.Name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard Singapore

Description.Text:
Find a private haven at our serviced suites in Singapore. Embrace the best of Singapore at this luxurious serviced apartment hotel located beside Somerset MRT, in the heart of Orchard Road, just 20 minutes from Changi Airport. Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard, Singapore offers guests a premium extended-stay experience.
At our serviced apartments in Singapore, you can indulge in your most lavish desires. Our friendly 24-hour Personal Assistants will help you connect with your new surroundings, while our housekeeping and technology services make it easy for you to enjoy your stay in Singapore, safe in the knowledge that you have all your needs taken care of.
Located less than 10 minutes from both the central business district and Suntec City International Convention & Exhibition Centre. The iconic Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard, Singapore offers apartments conveniently situated next to Somerset MRT station on Orchard Road, right in the heart of Singapore's most prominent shopping paradise.

Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard, Singapore is located next to Somerset MRT stattion on Orchard Road. It is surrounded by all the amenties and exciting developments you would expect right in the heart of Singapore's most prestigious shopping district.

Executive Suite - Well-appointed and contemporary in design, the Executive Suite is ideal for guests seeking a comfortable extended stay.
Its unique layout, where the bedroom and living area is separated by the bathroom, is a winner with guests. The spacious bathroom also offers a separate bath and shower configuration.
Each Suite offers panoramic views of bustling Orchard Road.
The Suite's features include an electronic safe, broadband internet, iron / board, hair dryer, LCD television with cable channels, home entertainment system, washer cum dryer, well-equipped kitchen and fully air-conditioned.
One Bedroom Executive Suite - Well-appointed in a contemporary colour scheme, the One Bedroom Executive Suite feature an adjoining living and dining room area to the bedroom.
Guests will enjoy the additional space that the living room offers, replete with a sofa set and television. There is a dedicated space for the dining area for cosy dinner parties.
All Suites offer panoramic views of dazzling Orchard Road or the lush greenery offered by Somerset Road.
The Suite's features include an electronic safe, broadband internet, iron / board, hair dryer, LCD television with cable channels, home entertainment system, washer cum dryer, well-equipped kitchen and is fully air-conditioned.
Two Bedroom Executive Suite - Our Two Bedroom Executive Suites in warm and cosy colour schemes come with an interesting layout and a separate entrance for the second bedroom.
Guests will enjoy the additional space that the living room offers, replete with a sofa set and television. There is a dedicated space for the dining area for cosy dinner parties.
Guests will enjoy the panoramic view of Singapore's exciting Somerset's view of lush greenery.
The Suite's features include an electronic safe, broadband internet, iron / board, hair dryer, LCD television with cable channels, home entertainment system, washer and dryer, well-equipped kitchen and is fully air-conditioned.
Bedrock Bar and Grill - Enjoy a sophisticated dining experience with a modern, international flavour.
Oriole Cafe and Bar - Discover honest coffee roasted in-house along with comforting global cuisine and fresh cocktails.
